key.name: extension-version
key.description: Extension version for display in extension preferences.

key.name: shell-version
key.description: Supported gnome-shell version(s) for display in extension preferences.

key.name: shortcut
key.description: The keyboard shortcut to toggle the do not disturb button state.

key.name: panel-icon-center
key.description: If true panel button icon position left center or right center.

key.name: panel-icon-left
key.description: Panel button icon position left, right, left center, or right center.

key.name: panel-count-show
key.description: If true, display the number of notifications.

key.name: busy-state
key.description: If true, busy state is set at enable.

key.name: override
key.summary: Override persistent busy state at session startup.
key.description: If true, determine state from overrride-busy-state.

key.name: overrride-busy-state
key.description: If true, state is set busy at startup.

key.name: reset-icon
key.summary: Effect change of panel button icon.
key.description: When toggled the extension is disabled and then enabled.

key.name: available-icon
key.description: Default or selected icon path.

key.name: busy-icon
key.description: Default or selected icon path.

key.name: time-out-enabled
key.description: When true the Busy State Timeout is operational.

key.name: time-out-once
key.description: When true the Busy State Timeout is disabled after one timeout.

key.name: time-out-always
key.description: When true the Busy State Timeout will start at busy state detection.

key.name: time-out-hours
key.description: Minutes 0-59 portion of the Busy State Timeout interval.

key.name: time-out-minutes
key.description: Hours 0-23 portion of the Busy State Timeout interval.

key.name: time-out-interval
key.description: Total of time-out-hours and time-out-minutes in minutes.

key.name: mute-busy
key.description: When true volume control is muted.

key.name: unmute-available
key.description: When true volume control is un-muted.
